description: misc/dashboard: add go.tools to list of subrepos

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org, adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

If I submit this, are you able to redeploy build.golang.org ?

On Sun, May 19, 2013 at 9:41 AM, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d8aeb43d6127 ***

misc/dashboard: add go.tools to list of subrepos

R=r, adg, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9535044

On Sat, May 18, 2013 at 4:42 PM, Dave Cheney <dave@cheney.net> wrote:

> If I submit this, are you able to redeploy build.golang.org ?

Yeah, will do.
I've pushed it, and visited /init. I think that's it.

Thanks, we'll see after the next commit. 

On 19/05/2013, at 10:34, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:

> I've pushed it, and visited /init. I think that's it.

subject: code review 9535044: misc/dashboard: add go.tools to list of subrepos
